item.title: S3 2018 Recap
item.description: An Overview Recap Some Personal Thoughts On Evolution (No, Not That One) On The Sports Science See-Saw On Machine Learning Staying out of the Weeds An Overview The first S3 (Sports Science Summit) is officially in the books. Organized (at least from what I can tell) and moderated by Gary McCoy, the conference was meant to provide insights from some of the most progressive sports science programs in the US.
